website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight shoe that stands out for its comfort and flexibility.
pros: Cleats work on real and artificial turf
In addition to black, these fun lace-up shoes come in a selection of bright colors
Not as costly as some other men's soccer cleats
cons: With the lower price comes a decrease in durability over some of the market's pricier choices

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son is still growing and goes through cleats more often than I'd like. Two pairs per year at the current rate, with only a few months of play time in the local league (spring and fall). Trying to balance his adult-sized shoes with less expensive prices is a must for us. These weren't expensive, but they arestylish in terms of their design and functional for playing on turf and grass fields. His friends have all asked where he got them because they are "cool" and he's very proud. I'm happy because they fit well and didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat for coaching.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 4 weeks in and they are holding strong. Even made it through a scrimmage for my daughter. They are fairly comfortable but still a little stiff. I can’t say that they would be great and hold up if you were a player, but I purchased these to wear while coaching. They are a little stiff, but I’m sure they will break in. Only been wearing two weeks so I can’t testify to the longevity of the exterior either. Overall they work without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McMichael

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold up to every day use.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit great and felt good on my sons foot. Unfortunately they fell apart after only 2 months of use. That being said, they were being used 6 days a week. If you are looking for a pr to wear a couple days a week, they would probably be fine, but if your son is on the high school soccer team, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTrumpeter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old soccer play. Only had to last one season since he’ll out grow them before next year. They lasted all season. No blisters. No problem. They are still good enough to donate so some else can use them next year.
customer_reviews.author: Hark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: The cost of cleats in our area is a minimum of 40.00 a pair for Puma, more for other brands. That is also hoping his size is available and we don't have to order them. He loves the color and the comfort and he plays hard in these cleats. Not once have they started to come apart or buckle under the pressure :) Very pleased. Will be purchasing again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David Zuger

customer_reviews.title: Glued together
customer_reviews.text: These...are terrible. They are literally glued together. I found this out when I went to pull out the tongue and I found yellow glue lining the interior of the shoe. Also, the laces are crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Jec2001

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice but constructed poorly
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to find a soccer shoe that is wide/ regular fit comparable to a shoe. This shoe fits great to my sons foot however before he could even wear it the lace hole tore in half because of the weak insulation of the shoe. I wish I could fit a shoe with this perfect fit that couldn't be torn in two.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Melton

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I need them for!
customer_reviews.text: Likes : color, style, fit. They are decently made. The quality will last for a bit I bought for coaching and I think they will be ok for the time being!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Marcano

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice pair of soccer cleats. Only complaint- one top lace hole on each shoe is off. Had to finagle to lace up. My son loves the color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Robsol22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for soccer. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Fit my son who has wider feet
customer_reviews.text: The size was right on and they are wide enough for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Anneke Szyperski

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and arrived very quickly! They fit true to size and look great! My soccer player loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for socker
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the shoes for my daughter who plays girls socker. She is super excited about the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Eslick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe! Son loves them, fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: CCAmama

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, reasonable quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for growing boy, I think they will last the season before he out grows them 😅 Size was spot on, I will order again if we need another larger pair.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: 10 yo son loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Iverson

customer_reviews.title: They are sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came right in time , although they were a little bigger then expected, this allowed my son to use his inserts to help with his heal pain. They’re sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen N. Birster

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and they were a great success. Fit well and the color scheme was a hit
customer_reviews.author: marc korting

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality...hoping they will last for one short soccer season
customer_reviews.author: Briana Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 pairs for my children... look just like the pics and true to size... very happy with my purchase especially for price...
customer_reviews.author: melinda

product_meta.title: Cambridge Select Men's Lace-up Cleats Soccer Shoe
feature_bullets: FLEXIBLE: Lightweight upper shapes to your foot to keep out turf and allow stable movement
TRACTION: Stud-style cleats grip grass or turf
ADJUSTABLE: Lace up front/side tie closure
